JobFullDesc: Our Global Security organization is comprised of multiple teams that work together to support our operations around the globe. Our mission is to keep the things that we value safe and secure while protecting the people, assets, and reputation of Facebook. We protect the people of Facebook by creating a safe and secure environment for our culture to flourish. From buildings and servers, to prototypes and ideas, we ensure Facebook’s physical and intellectual assets are safe and secure and make informed decisions to protect Facebook’s reputation. The Director of Global Security Services will lead a regional team focused on protecting Facebook personnel and facilities. In this role, you will own the strategy, development and deployment of a comprehensive physical security operations program that aligns with our organizational and operational risk profile. The successful candidate will be a thoughtful and tenured leader, with proven experience leading a regional team in a multinational company.
